author: mariadalfonso
body:
Update of HCAL@HLT for Run3 are into ConfDB & the HLT menus.

this PR contains two customization functions to run on the 2018 data to remove depth collapsing: the HLT is now identical to the Offline, both HB and HE are phase1 upgrade and update Mahi: following the Run2-legacy/Run3 offline setup

The two options are provided to start from the Run3 menu or from the Run2 menu.
(note in 2018 HB is still phase0 w/QIE8 and only one depth) 

A number of duplicates were identified and suggested to remove for Run3.
title: HBHE: HLT Run3 configuration
